title: Why Blogs Are the Best
text: Blogs are seriously the best, and it's because you can post anything you want for the world to see. You get to share your thoughts and ideas with a wide audience.

title: Why Blogs Are the Worst
text: Blogs are not good for the world. We don't need everyone's opinion on everything all the time, and then there's the matter of privacy. That's a debate for another time.

title: I Love Reading Blogs, But I Would Never Write One
text: I adore reading blogs on all sorts of things from nail art to new tech trends. However, I could never write one. I just don't have the creativity or expertise to continually create new content.
